title: Abolición de la propiedad (2012)
overview: (In a dark basement) Norma hears the faint voice of Everio and her own, from an Ampex vintage tape recorder. They have been talking incessantly, and *oftentimes the taped conversations coincide with their *chats. The only thing troubling Norma is that until that day, she and Everio had never met and the last she heard was Everio strangling her.
storyline: In a dark basement, Norma hears his voice and Everio in an old Ampex tape recorder. Every time he goes down again stops. They have been palatinates their lives, and several times the recorded conversations end coinciding with the talks they hold. What worries Norma is that until that day did not know Everio, and the last thing I heard was that he hanged.
